docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: WITH age comes wisdom, judgment and self control. Or so we are told. While such attributes don't necessarily earn us more respect in an era that focuses on youth, they are supposed to give us an upper hand in life's daily battles. Reading the fine print may take longer, but it should have more meaning.

headline.main: Shooter's Age Is Hot Target Of Discussion

byline.original: By Margaret Moorman; Margaret Moorman is a senior editor of ARTnews magazine

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: I ONCE TUTORED JUNIOR-high geometry, and one of my most difficult pupils would sit at the kitchen table - wild hair flying, bubble gum popping - as she insisted again and again that she didn't understand.
